name: Catch That Bus!
description:
Is the cup half full or half empty?

 Are you late for the last bus, or early for the next bus?

Clearly, you're LATE for the last bus!

Chase after the bus, avoid cars, pedestrians, and beat cops looking out for your safety. The sooner catch the bus - the more points. The less times you get hit - the more points. The less times you get a J-walking ticket - the more points.
